name: Bryan Brown
title: Budtender
coverLetter: I'm a hard worker and a self starter and I have my OLCC Marijuana Permit. I've done everything from customer service to sales to even medical collections, I've done it all. I have a great track record of experience and a welt lb knowledge in business. I love to have fun and yet always stay on task, I'm a huge stickler for details and timelines and always get he job done right. I'd be a great addition to your team.
